name: The Days Before
description:
A fan-created Visual Novel about Egil and what came before Arglas's possession and the attack on Mechonis. Explores snippets of not only Egil and Arglas's relationship, but also Egil's relationships to others of the Bionis and his sister. Also features some headcanon in the way of the disciples as they were originally known, and some of the Goddesses of the High Entia (though, of course, it's all techincally headcanon give or take basic events).

Content Warnings mostly for things you can find in the base game such as loss of sense of self, mass murder, and manipulation. Should you see anything else in need of mentioning, do let me know!

This was practice to attempt to learn how to use Ren'py more fluently, I hope you enjoy!

If it's enjoyed enough could potentially be expanded on with more scenes? That's to be seen.
